violations: No PPE (hard hats, vests, gloves) for multiple workers
Worker close to operating machinery without safety barriers
Improper stacking of materials (cylindrical items on floor)
No clear marking of emergency exits or pathways
locations: Floor area with stacked cylindrical items
General lack of signage throughout the site
recommendations: Ensure all workers wear appropriate PPE at all times.
Install safety barriers and maintain a safe distance from machinery when operational.
Reorganize and secure materials safely to prevent tripping hazards.
Clearly mark and ensure pathways and emergency exits are visible and unobstructed.
worker_positions: Worker near machinery on the left in a pink shirt
Worker kneeling near machinery on the right

worker_identifiers.features: no visible PPE, near stacked materials
